name: Ch.6BaseConvo2
_source: speak;Moulder;Good morning there young lad.|Is there something I can do for you?
speak;Joshua;Yeah, I got a recommendation saying that you know a thing or two about magic.|Also that you can take a hit too.
speak;Moulder;I don't know where you heard that from.|Though you do learn a thing or two once you're my age.
speak;Joshua;That's what I like to hear!|I want you to teach me how magic works and how to take a hit from magic.
speak;Moulder;Why in the world are you interested now?
speak;Joshua;Let's just say I've got some...|Dealings coming in soon and I want to be prepared.
speak;Moulder;I see.|Unfortunately, I don't have time to teach you both.
speak;Joshua;I see...|Well, how about this.|We'll flip a coin and if it lands on heads, you teach me magic.|If tails, you teach me magic defense.|Ok?
speak;Moulder;I'm usually not one for chance, but it doesn't matter to me in this case.
speak;Joshua;Alright then.|Let's see what lady luck has in store!
speak;Joshua;Looks like it was heads.|Alright old man, teach me some magic.
speak;Moulder;I'm not that old, but I'll teach you a thing or two.
alert;Joshua's MAG growth has increased by 40!
speak;Joshua;Looks like it was tails.|Alright old man, teach me how to take a magical blow.
speak;Moulder;I'm not that old, but I'll teach you a thing or two.|Now here I come.
alert;Joshua's RES growth has increased by 40!
